title: The true Elementalist Lux's Final Form

replies.body: Aaand this is what happens when you stack all the forms on top of each other. :D

I think this should be an optional evolve at level 18 when you are on a kill streak or something.

It has this "I'M THE SURPREME EMPEROR OF THE ELEMENTS" feel to it, given that it is so tacky it's actually a demonstration of power.
Nope.jpg :P This thing would be an absolute nightmare once animated.
Just go make a new skin called FINAL FORM LUX XD

Easter egg for a lux with 6 times 25stack {{item:3041}}  pls? 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Unique Passive

But I assume you knew that based on the {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}?  Or were you just being super hopeful?
Yes I knew.
I think this can be done quite well actually. Just view it as a challenge :P
New skin tier: More Ultimatier.
The proper name of the tier would be "Ultimatissimo" ^^
Don't tell me the people who created the skin didn't stack them for shits and giggles? What heresy is this?
Mayyyybe. Just maybe. :3

Rito plis..
http://img1.ak.crunchyroll.com/i/spire2/c862b8aee40eb8bfb1db2418e6dd621e1388636081_full.jpg
+1 for the Kill La Kill reference
Yeah, actually that was pretty obvious, lol.

{{champion:99}} This isn't even my final form.

{{champion:64}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:421}}   ??????

{{champion:99}} BEHOLD! *Turns into what the OP displayed*

{{champion:127}} What does she look like now Lee?

{{champion:64}} I-I don't know. Rek'sai, what do you see?

{{champion:421}} *Confused chirping*

{{champion:99}} ............................. *facepalm*

More like:

{{champion:99}} **BEHOLD!**
{{champion:64}} My eyes! Oh, the light is so powerful, someone make it stop. Help me Lissandra!
{{champion:127}} Fuck Freljord, fuck my race, fuck the watchers, I've seen perfection! I wish to serve you! Rek'sai, can you see it?
{{champion:421}}  OMG GUYS, I'VE SEEN GOD. I'VE SEEN GOD! PLEASE LET ME JOIN YOU IN YOUR QUEST FOR GLORY!
{{champion:99}} "Double rainbow ? Pffff casual, I do 10 whenever I want."

"Ultimate Elementalist"

Lux 10. Omnilux. Y'know what I'm getting at here.

YES I NEED THAT!!

http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/villains/images/a/a7/730892-kill_la_kill_17_large_31.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20151025021629
I'm just imaging how much my game will lag if this was a thing. My god, the frames....
http://moonsticks.org/images/comics/17_evolution_sailormoon.jpg
http://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/FrillyUpgrade
I think my eyes started bleeding from the sheer awesomeness of that thing.
Can you say 'kitsch'?
LOL please no. I would actually just never evolve to final if this was a thing

Born in the highlands of Demacia.

There can be only one.
The Highlighter.
lgbt lux when
Actually, i feel like Lissandra Fiber Queen would be a better fit for Ragyo.
Avatar Lux

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}} 

Do Want.
Ugh, Lux is the worst. They keep making her progressively more derpy. (Not really the call of this thread, but w.e.)
